alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 13 at 4:40AM AKST until December 13 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 10 inches. East winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Visibilities reduced to one quarter mile or less at times. A long period of blowing snow could produce significant drifts of snow.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel very hazardous. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you.If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.
